Paragraph: CONCLUSIONS : These data show that inhibition of NF - kappaB activation attenuates tubulointerstitial nephritis induced by gentamicin .

Note that "tubulointerstitial nephritis" is mentioned twice in the paragraph, once as the main disease entity and once as a subordinate entity (i.e., "gentamicin-induced tubulointerstitial nephritis").
